item.title: The Socialist Party in Lisbon requests an audit of the housing lottery.
item.description:
**Headline:** Lisbon PS Advocates for Independent Audit on Housing Lottery
**Summary:** The PS in Lisbon is advocating for an independent audit to enhance the credibility of the City Hall, which has already initiated an internal inquiry.
item.content:encoded:
**Headline:** Lisbon PS Advocates for Independent Audit on Housing Lottery
**Summary:** The PS in Lisbon is advocating for an independent audit to enhance the credibility of the City Hall, which has already initiated an internal inquiry.

item.title: The United States introduces new visa regulations requiring foreign students to provide access to their social media profiles.
item.description:
**Headline:** New US Visa Guidelines Request Social Media Access for Foreign Students
**Summary:** Foreign students applying for educational and exchange visas in the United States may be asked to provide access to their social media profiles as part of a broader assessment conducted by US diplomats. The process aims to identify any potential concerns regarding attitudes towards US citizens, culture, and institutions. These guidelines, introduced by the state department, focus on ensuring transparency and security in the visa application process.
item.content:encoded:
**Headline:** New US Visa Guidelines Request Social Media Access for Foreign Students
**Summary:** Foreign students applying for educational and exchange visas in the United States may be asked to provide access to their social media profiles as part of a broader assessment conducted by US diplomats. These guidelines, introduced by the state department, focus on ensuring transparency and security in the visa application process.

item.title: Organisers state that Notting Hill Carnival in the UK requires immediate funding to continue.
item.description:
Headline: Notting Hill Carnival Seeks Additional Funding for Future Continuation
Summary: Ian Comfort, the chair of Notting Hill Carnival, has reached out to Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy to request further financial support to help ensure the event's future success.
item.content:encoded:
Headline: Notting Hill Carnival Seeks Additional Funding for Future Continuation
Summary: Ian Comfort, the chair of Notting Hill Carnival, has reached out to Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy to request further financial support to help ensure the event's future success.

item.title: American diplomats leave Israel.
item.description:
Headline: U.S. Diplomats Temporarily Depart from Israel
Summary: According to a statement from the United States Embassy, as reported by The New York Times, U.S. diplomats have temporarily left Israel. Meanwhile, the Israeli Prime Minister has expressed gratitude for Donald Trump's support in defending the country.
item.content:encoded:
Headline: U.S. Diplomats Temporarily Depart from Israel
Summary: According to a statement from the United States Embassy, as reported by The New York Times, U.S. diplomats have temporarily left Israel. Meanwhile, the Israeli Prime Minister has expressed gratitude for Donald Trump's support in defending the country.

item.title: Revealed: Greenhouse Gas Emissions from Australia's North West Shelf Project
item.description:
**Headline:** Overview: Greenhouse Gas Emissions from the North West Shelf Project
**Summary:** The North West Shelf gas project, located on the Burrup Peninsula in Western Australia, is a significant liquified natural gas initiative managed by Woodside. In May, it received approval from the government to continue its operations from 2030 to 2070. The project contributes to greenhouse gas emissions across various categories, as documented in several environmental reports. Understanding the scope of these emissions and comparing them with other sectors and companies provides a comprehensive picture of its environmental impact.
item.content:encoded:
**Headline:** Overview: Greenhouse Gas Emissions from the North West Shelf Project
**Summary:** The North West Shelf gas project, located on the Burrup Peninsula in Western Australia, is a significant liquified natural gas initiative managed by Woodside. Understanding the scope of these emissions and comparing them with other sectors and companies provides a comprehensive picture of its environmental impact.

item.title: A leaked letter indicates that the Notting Hill Carnival in the UK requires urgent funding to continue.
item.description:
**Headline:** Notting Hill Carnival Organizers Request Government Funds to Ensure Future Events
**Summary:** The organizers of Notting Hill Carnival have reached out to the UK government, seeking financial support to secure the event's future. In a letter to Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy, Ian Comfort, the chair of the carnival, emphasized the necessity of public funding. The BBC reported on this development, highlighting efforts to maintain the vibrant cultural celebration.
item.content:encoded:
**Headline:** Notting Hill Carnival Organizers Request Government Funds to Ensure Future Events
**Summary:** The organizers of Notting Hill Carnival have reached out to the UK government, seeking financial support to secure the event's future. In a letter to Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy, Ian Comfort, the chair of the carnival, emphasized the necessity of public funding. The BBC reported on this development, highlighting efforts to maintain the vibrant cultural celebration.

item.title: The Federal Reserve maintains interest rates, contrary to former President Trump's request to reduce them.
item.description:
**Headline:** Federal Reserve Maintains Current Interest Rates with Future Cuts Possible
**Summary:** The Federal Reserve has decided to keep interest rates unchanged while indicating the potential for two rate cuts later in the year. This comes as President Trump has expressed a preference for lower rates. The central bank has adjusted its inflation projections upwards and revised its economic growth forecasts, reflecting current economic policies.
item.content:encoded:
**Headline:** Federal Reserve Maintains Current Interest Rates with Future Cuts Possible
**Summary:** The Federal Reserve has decided to keep interest rates unchanged while indicating the potential for two rate cuts later in the year. This comes as President Trump has expressed a preference for lower rates. The central bank has adjusted its inflation projections upwards and revised its economic growth forecasts, reflecting current economic policies.

item.title: Temperatures in France are expected to reach 37°C in Paris and Bordeaux and 36°C in Lyon on Saturday, marking the peak of the heatwave.
item.description:
Headline: Expected High Temperatures of 37°C in Paris and Bordeaux, 36°C in Lyon This Saturday
Summary: Many regions in France are anticipated to experience high temperatures this weekend, with a relief forecast from cooler weather and potential thunderstorms arriving on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
Headline: Expected High Temperatures of 37°C in Paris and Bordeaux, 36°C in Lyon This Saturday
Summary: Many regions in France are anticipated to experience high temperatures this weekend, with a relief forecast from cooler weather and potential thunderstorms arriving on Monday.
